column1: #Text=Ming - Hua says : " We should 've grabbed one of those cops .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " She 's with the Metal Clan .
#Text=" Main Bolin Korra Lin Beifong Mako Opal Beifong Suyin Beifong Antagonists Ghazan Ming - Hua P'Li Zaheer says : " Minor Aiwei Asami Sato Baatar Baatar Jr. .
#Text=Chef Guo Huan Pabu Toph Beifong Truck driver Varrick Wei and Wing Zhu Li " Shiro Shinobi says : " Ba Sing Se has fallen .
#Text=After Zaheer and the Red Lotus toppled the Earth Queen , the city descended into chaos .
#Text=Meanwhile , Korra and Asami tried to escape their captors , but crashed in the desert .
#Text=After getting to safety , they met up with Lord Zuko , Tonraq , and Beifong .
#Text=Back in Ba Sing Se , Zaheer freed Mako and Bolin , giving them a vital message to deliver to Korra , but will the brothers find her in time ?
